incidents.name: Issue with Call Dialing Delays to Multiple Carriers in Egypt

incident_updates.body: Twilio Voice was degraded between 07:36 and 15:40 Pacific Time on 07/07/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced call dialing delays to multiple carriers in Egypt. The issue has now been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: 5xx's from Programmable Messaging API

incident_updates.body: The Twilio Programmable Messaging API was partially degraded for 13 minutes on July 8, 2025 between 10:42 PST and 10:55 PST. During this period of time, customers may have received elevated volumes of 5xx's in API responses. This issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Errors Making GET Requests to the Programmable Voice Calls API

incident_updates.body: Twilio Voice API was degraded for 14 minutes between 09:28 and 09:42 Pacific Time on 07/08/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced increased HTTP 500s when making GET requests to the Programmable Voice Calls API endpoints for completed calls. Call creation and in-progress calls were not affected. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Intelligent Alerts Delivery Issues

incident_updates.body: Twilio Intelligent Alerts was degraded for 30 minutes between 1:02am UTC on July 3rd and 1:32am UTC on 07/03/2025. During this time, customers may have experienced issues with Intelligent Alert delivery for subscribed customers. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Sender ID Deliverability

incident_updates.body: Twilio Sender IDs were degraded during the last 2 days. During this period of time customers may have experienced problems related to message deliverability using Sender IDs. The issue has now been resolved.
